name: Instant, Mobile, Fantasy Sports.
blurb: Challenge anyone instantly to a fantasy football game through your phone - Instant, Mobile, Fantasy Sports!

rewards.reward: <<<<<THE PIGSKIN>>>>>Thank You! Help us take fantasy sports to the next level! You\u2019ll receive a sincere thank you from the FanDrafter team and we\u2019ll keep you posted on all our updates for this season and beyond!

<<<<<POP-WARNER>>>>>A custom FanDrafter KICKSTARTER Thank You postcard (think of it as a 3 \u00bd\u201d x 5\u201d work of art) from the CEO & COO AND 3-pack Custom designed FanDrafter desktop backgrounds & wallpapers for iPhone and Android phones made especially for this KICKSTARTER campaign guaranteed to sting your retinas! PLUS: Be one of the first to know when we launch FanDrafter! *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<VARSITY TEAM>>>>>ALL POP-WARNER LEVEL REWARDS + Your name included in a custom FanDrafter KICKSTARTER Honor Poster along with every name of each one of our backers, a poster both the CEO and COO will have hanging in our office and homes (we will never forget you)! Your name on our website thanking you as a KICKSTARTER backer for all the world to see and a Facebook & twitter shout out(you\u2019ll be trending!!) and of course, a subscription to FanDrafter! *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<ALL-STATE>>>>>(SWAG LEVEL)ALL VARSITY TEAM LEVEL REWARDS + Free advanced premium cheats and upgrades on every updated version of FanDrafter! *Believe us, we\u2019re only scratching the surface here...we wish we could spill a little of our \u201csecret sauce\u201d here but, ugh....they\u2019re so worth the wait (this is a no brainer)! Just in time for football season:  A custom FanDrafter t-shirt! Just like the ones the FanDrafter team wear out and about (ALL-STATE t-shirt ONLY available on this level, is NOT included in higher levels). Exclusive FanDrafter KICKSTARTER football bottle Koozie and exclusive FanDrafter KICKSTARTER keychain bottle opener (both proven to keep the cold drinks colder and your pop tops popped!) *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<COLLEGIATE>>>>>(EARLY BIRD SPECIAL)ALL STATE LEVEL REWARDS + 1 WEEK EARLY ACCESS to FanDrafter before anyone else as special honorary Beta tester! We\u2019ll call you directly and make sure you\u2019re all set to play with us as we hunt for any last minute bugs a week before \u201cthe doors open\u201d. Your name in the app thanking you as a: Creative Backer (our names weren\u2019t even in the original beta!!!) and an exclusive limited edition FanDrafter BETA KICKSTARTER t-shirt (the real nice tagless t-shirts that all the kids are talking about! We will limit the production to only you 40 people, we will never make THIS t-shirt again!)**PLEASE ADD $10 FOR U.S. DOMESTIC SHIPPING *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<ROSE BOWL>>>>>ALL STATE LEVEL REWARDS + Your name listed in the credits of the FanDrafter app itself as a Creative Backer (our names weren\u2019t even in the original beta!!!) and exclusive limited edition FanDrafter KICKSTARTER t-shirt (real sweet tagless t-shirts, not the cheap thin ones you find from the bootleggers in the ball game parking lot! Limited to this KICKSTARTER campaign only, once they\u2019re gone...they\u2019re gone!)**PLEASE ADD $10 FOR U.S. DOMESTIC SHIPPING *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<HEISMAN>>>>>ALL ROSE BOWL REWARD LEVELS + Replace Your Face! Have your photo replace the picture of an NFL player in our app! For one week, your picture will be viewed in place of any players picture in FanDrafter, requests on a first come first served basis! How cool is this gonna be? Have you ever drafted yourself onto your fantasy football team? (unless your name is Maurice Jones Drew....the answer is probably NO.) and a personal phone call from the FanDrafter team!**PLEASE ADD $10 FOR U.S. DOMESTIC SHIPPING *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<PRO>>>>>ALL ROSE BOWL REWARD LEVELS + Early FanDrafter BETA invitations for all new future versions of FanDrafter (2.0+ including MLB, NBA & NHL)! Get your hands on our beta platforms before anyone else! Work directly with the FanDrafter team and help shape the future of fantasy sports by testing our new platforms as they launch and give us your feedback on the features you want to see! And a custom printed FanDrafter regulation size Wilson football signed by the creators of FanDrafter! (Like the one in the video, these are so sweet, we\u2019re gonna order a couple more for holiday gifts! (shopping: done.)) and a personal phone call from the FanDrafter team!**PLEASE ADD $20 FOR U.S. DOMESTIC SHIPPING *see Rewards for preview!

<<<<<PRO BOWL>>>>>ALL PRO LEVEL REWARDS + Championship Founders Ring! Your own exclusive FanDrafter Founder bling reserved for our diehard high level backers only! These are real big pieces of hardware that you can get engraved and place right on your desk as a paper weight or rock it on a chain around your neck Jersey style! Challenge us to a FanDraftger game and come see it unfold live when you join us in person at an NFL game (our treat) in San Diego, San Francisco or Oakland! (game TBD), your name on our website and app as a Founding Backer AND help shape future releases (through 2015) of FanDrafter by receiving special focus group invites. (You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation to and from the game) - Don\u2019t think of this as a reward, it\u2019s an experience. A see it to believe it sorta thing. To us, you are already part of our FanDrafter family. *see Rewards for more details.

<<<<<PRO BOWL MVP>>>>>ALL PRO LEVEL REWARDS + (We figured, you may want to bring someone else with you (it's a good excuse to make someone else drive!)) 2 Championship Founders Rings! Your own exclusive FanDrafter Founder bling reserved for our diehard high level backers only! These are real big pieces of hardware that you can get engraved and place right on your desk as a paperweight or rock it on a chain around your neck Jersey style! Challenge us to a FanDraftger game and come see it unfold live when you and a guest join us in person at an NFL game (our treat) in San Diego, San Francisco or Oakland! (game TBD), your names on our website and app as a Founding Backers AND help shape future releases (through 2015) of FanDrafter by receiving special focus group invites. (You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation to and from the game) - Don\u2019t think of this as a reward, it\u2019s an experience. A see it to believe it sorta thing. To us, you are already part of our FanDrafter family. *see Rewards for more details.

<<<<<\u201cTHE CATCH\u201d>>>>>ALL PRO LEVEL REWARDS + Of all the rewards...this is the one that means the most to us: A Dwight Clark (the catch) autographed copy of TECMO BOWL (only one in existence in the world) and the CEOs original Nintendo Entertainment System that he had as a child that would inspire FanDrafter later in life! A member of the FanDrafter team a long time ago as a child bumped into Dwight Clark, growing up in Northern California...everyone knows \u201cThe Catch\u201d that took place between Montana and Clark, the touchdown thrown in the NFC Championship Game to win the whole thing over the Cowboys in 1982. You don\u2019t just bump into football royalty and NOT get an autograph, right? And it just so happened, this was the only thing he had on him, thus making it the only one possibly in existence! (and we have the photo of the autograph happening to prove it!) Dwight himself said it was the first video game he ever autographed. In either case, the signature is authenticated with its own certificate. How many \u201cfantasy\u201d NFL simulations were played on TECMO BOWL as a kid, we couldn\u2019t tell you but just to make it a few more, we\u2019re also giving you an original NES system that belongs to the CEO, this project means-that-much-to-us. As if that weren\u2019t enough, challenge us to a FanDraftger game and come see it unfold live when you join us in person at an NFL game (our treat) in San Diego (game TBD) AND one game in either San Francisco or Oakland (games TBD), your name on our website and app as a Founding Backer. (You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation to and from the games) This is not a reward, to us, it\u2019s a good trade, we know whoever we hand this reward level to, will be a true FanDrafter alum. *see Rewards for more details.

<<<<<BIG GAME>>>>>ALL PRO LEVEL REWARDS + Game on a Plane! We\u2019ve done this a few times and believe us when we say, it is the ONLY way to see an NFL game. We called in some favors from a few old, bold, pilot friends of ours (from a past life) and came up with this one-of-a-kind experience. You and a guest meet up with us in San Diego flying round trip from Los Angeles to San Diego (game TBD) in your very own private plane(pilot included) and play along with us as you and your guest watch a Chargers game with the CEO & COO along with other backers of FanDrafter; 2 Championship Founders Rings! Your own exclusive FanDrafter Founder bling reserved for our diehard high level backers only; your names on our website and app as a Founding Backers AND help shape future releases (through 2015) of FanDrafter by receiving special focus group invites! (same day round trip only, origination of the flight must be within 50 miles of LAX, no overnight accommodation provided) If you were looking to find that very special gift for that guy or girl that has everything, or just want to impress someone....look no further. *see Rewards for more details.

<<<<<HALL OF FAME>>>>>ALL PRO LEVEL REWARDS + Game on a Plane (part Deux)! (you looked further...) Ok, now this is something not even we have done. But if flying to San Diego to see a game is sweet, this one is sweeter! You and a guest meet up with us flying round trip from Los Angeles to San Francisco in your very own private plane (pilot included) and play along with us as we watch either a San Francisco or Oakland (games TBD) game with the CEO & COO along with other backers of FanDrafter; 2 Championship Founders Rings! Your own exclusive FanDrafter Founder bling reserved for our diehard high level backers only; your names on our website and app as a Founding Backers AND help shape future releases (through 2015) of FanDrafter by receiving special focus group invites! (same day round trip only, no overnight accommodation provided)...what else can we say but thank you, there\u2019s no way to tell you how much this means to us, we hope that in sharing our rewards with you, that you can see how much we care about this. Thanks for your support. *see Rewards for more details.
